channel.title: poeple interested in joining an immortal realm

item.title: Re: poeple interested in joining an immortal realm
Re: poeple interested in joining an immortal realm
item.content:encoded: nevermind about this, offer is void. mods please delete this.

item.title: Re: poeple interested in joining an immortal realm
item.content:encoded:
that was me BTW, it logged me out before i posted it for some reason.

also, change that to two super potions/CRW for the first two, and only one super potion/ CRW for the two after that.
this will only be the case if at least two people join from here, if it's only one person, he only get's one.

item.title: poeple interested in joining an immortal realm
item.content:encoded:
there will be a new immortal realm in a couple of weeks(maybe sooner), i need people who want to join. you need to be season 2 already.
please tell me if you will definitely join.

anyone who does join (and stay) from here will get two super potions/ cure right wounds. you will get it after joining. only the first couple of people to reply with definite yeses will get this BTW.

the kage is McSmashy.

remember that all of the good new content will be immortal realm exclusive.

post here if you'll definitely join.
